abstract: Op-Ed article by former Commerce Secretary Carlos Gutierrez calls on American business community and Republicans to embrace Pres Obama's new approach to Cuba; points to elements of negotiations that have made him optimist about normalization process; underscores promise that American support for Cuban-born entrepreneurs and Cuban-run small businesses could have for changing the country.
lead_paragraph: Cuban-Americans and the G.O.P. must look to the future instead of the past. Ordinary Cubans need trade and engagement, not more isolation.

headline.main: A Republican Case for Obama’s Cuba Policy

snippet: Cuban-Americans and the G.O.P. must look to the future instead of the past. Ordinary Cubans need trade and engagement, not more isolation.
